fields.name: Passives:
fields.value:
- Outsider: You appear to not win with Order. 
- Deluded: You think you are an Order role, but are really a Heretic. You will appear to have all the regular abilities and passives of a normal Order role, except with these hidden passives.  You will learn of your true role if you live until N3.
- Dangerous: If the Order team wins and you are still alive, Order will lose and Chaos wins. [Activates N3]

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: If Order wins and you are still alive, then Chaos wins the game. Otherwise, you carry the regular Order win condition.
